If bodhisattva-mahÄsattvas, without skillful means, practice prajÃ±ÄpÄramitÄ, if they practice the noble truth of suffering, or practice the characteristics of the noble truth of suffering, it is not practicing prajÃ±ÄpÄramitÄ;
